humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are metastases in 3 out of 29 assessed lymph nodes (0/29). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient's pathologic N stage is N1a because metastatic carcinoma was found in 1-3 axillary lymph nodes (part 2 and part 3), and the total number of examined lymph nodes is 28 (part n). The N1a substage is used when there are 1-3 positive axillary nodes.
